QuestData.Title: Proving Oneself
QuestData.Description:
A gift from dragons may impress some centaur, but Clan Shikaar must see how well you hunt.
One of our hunting parties just brought down a proto-dragon infused with the power of flame. Prove your worth by aiding in the kill.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: When a young centaur comes of age, they're often expected to take part in their first proto-drake hunt.
QuestData.RewardText: You are a more formidable fighter than I assumed.
